name: Raspberry-pi-zero-on-pla-rail
tagline: This is for publishing my 1st Raspberry pi zero project - remote controlling a toy train "PLA-RAIL".
body:
### What is PLA RAIL
It is Japanese famous toy train.
See this for details.
http://www.takaratomy.co.jp/english/products/plarail/what/index.html

### Why Raspberry Pi zero?
Since its size may fit to PLA RAIL size.
Actually it does. See Wiki GALLERY.

### What to come
This is a totally personal project. I'll update when I have time.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
